Name: Lavender & Black Pepper Cocktail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Pour the syrup into an ice-filled mixing glass.
Add the vodka and black pepper.
Review: Subtly sweetened and lavender flavoured vodka, with a bump and grind of spicy pepper.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2006 by Richard Gillam at the Kenilworth Hotel, Warwickshire, England.
